channel.title: CVE Feed for NortonLifelock -- Avast Antivirus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NortonLifelock -- Avast Antivirus

item.title: CVE-2022-4291|2024-08-03T01:34:50.061Z -- nortonlifelock -- avast%20antivirus
item.description: The aswjsflt.dll library from Avast Antivirus windows contained a potentially exploitable heap corruption vulnerability that could enable an attacker to bypass the sandbox of the application it was loaded into, if applicable. This issue was fixed in version 18.0.1478 of the Script Shield Component.
